item.title: 行业机构称 4 月份欧盟新车销量增长 13.7
item.description: 欧洲汽车工业组织周三称，欧盟 4 月份新车销量同比增长 13.7%，创去年 10 月以来最大增幅，此前 3 月份新车注册量有所下降。【原文：New car sales in the European Union rose 13.7% in April on the year for their biggest jump since last October, Europe's auto industry body said on Wednesday, after registrations fell in March.】

item.title: G7 财长寻求在俄罗斯资产和中国问题上达成共识
item.description: 官员们表示，本周在意大利举行的七国集团（G7）财长会议将试图就如何利用被冻结的俄罗斯资产帮助乌克兰的战争努力，以及如何应对中国在关键市场日益增长的出口实力等问题找到共同点。【原文：G7 finance chiefs meeting in Italy this week will attempt to find common ground over how to use frozen Russian assets to help Ukraine's war effort and how to address China's growing export strength in key markets, officials said.】

item.title: 欧洲选股师用老派方法驾驭人工智能的下一波浪潮
item.description: 在人工智能芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）成为推动力一年后，欧洲选股者开始转向公用事业、专业数据提供商甚至铜矿商等更成熟的行业，以抓住人工智能热潮的下一波浪潮。【原文：European stock pickers are turning to more established sectors like utilities, professional data providers and even copper miners to tap into the next wave of the AI boom, a year after AI chipmaker Nvidia's emergence as a driving force.】

item.title: 人工智能重镇英伟达的财报将考验美股的创纪录表现
item.description: 半导体风向标英伟达（Nvidia）周三发布的财报将对美国股市的涨势构成最新考验。【原文：Earnings from semiconductor bellwether Nvidia on Wednesday are set to provide the latest test for a U.S. stock market rally that has taken indexes to record highs this year.】

item.title: 早间竞标英伟达守夜即将结束
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 对冲基金连续四周买入中国股票
item.description: 全球对冲基金连续第四周增持中国股票，与大批投资者一起试图在市场反弹前抢占先机。【原文：Global hedge funds added to their holdings of Chinese equities for a fourth straight week, joining hordes of investors trying to get ahead of a rebound in the market.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因英伟达的希望而上扬，新西兰元跳涨
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市走高，因为焦虑的投资者敢于寄希望于人工智能巨头英伟达（Nvidia）能够达到超高的预期，同时对美国和英国的利率前景保持警惕。【原文：Asian shares edged higher on Wednesday as anxious investors dared to hope AI-diva Nvidia could meet sky-high expectations, while keeping a wary eye on the outlook for U.S. and UK interest rates.】

item.title: 波音 "星际客机 "氦气泄漏再次延误机组人员首次飞行
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）在一份声明中说，本周二波音公司的 "星际客舱"（Starliner）首次载人飞行再次推迟，这样工程师们就可以花更多的时间来评估飞船推进系统中的氦泄漏问题。【原文：NASA again delayed Boeing's debut crewed flight of its Starliner capsule on Tuesday so engineers can spend more time evaluating a helium leak in the spacecraft's propulsion system, the agency said in a statement.】

item.title: 美国利率可能 "越升越长"，石油连续第三个交易日下滑
item.description: 周三，油价连续第三个交易日下跌，原因是市场预期美联储可能会因持续通胀而在更长时间内维持较高的美国利率，这可能会影响全球最大石油消费国的燃料使用。【原文：Oil prices fell for a third straight session on Wednesday on expectations the Federal Reserve could keep U.S. interest rates higher for longer due to sustained inflation, potentially impacting fuel use in the world's largest oil consumer.】

item.title: 美联储敦促耐心等待，美元盘整；市场等待会议纪要
item.description: 周三，美元兑少数几个国家的汇率持稳，因为市场评估了美联储官员要求保持耐心的呼吁，并在等待美联储会议纪要的公布，以获得更多有关央行发展路径的信息。【原文：The dollar was steady against a handful of peers on Wednesday, as the market assessed calls for patience from Federal Reserve officials and awaited the publication of Fed minutes for more insight on the central bank's path.】

item.title: 中概股牛气冲天，外国人却不敢贸然进入
item.description: 由于中国采取了最新措施，并承诺修复其陷入困境的经济中最薄弱的部分，国内投资者信心倍增，正在廉价的股市中抢购股票，而大多数外国投资者则满怀希望，但也在慢慢观望。【原文：Emboldened by China's latest measures and pledges to fix the weakest parts of its struggling economy, domestic investors are scooping up shares in a cheap stock market, while most foreign investors are hopeful but taking it slow.】

item.title: 固定宽带增长放缓影响收入前景，Viasat 股价下跌
item.description: 由于预计卫星服务业务将放缓，Viasat 预测的年收入低于华尔街预期，导致其股价在周二收盘后下跌超过 11%。【原文：Viasat forecast annual revenue below Wall Street estimates in anticipation of a slowdown in its satellite services business, sending its shares down more than 11% after the bell on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间交易新西兰、印尼设定利率；英伟达守夜即将结束
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美国航空公司寻求招聘空中交通管制人员，联邦航空局予以回击
item.description: 美国主要航空公司贸易组织周二敦促政府尽快采取行动，在夏季旅游旺季到来之前解决长期存在的空中交通管制员短缺问题，但美国联邦航空管理局局长指责该组织试图推卸航班延误的责任。【原文：The trade group for major U.S. airlines on Tuesday urged the government to act quickly to address a long-standing air traffic controller shortage ahead of the busy summer travel season but the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration chief accused the group of trying to deflect responsibility for flight delays.】

item.title: 谷歌将在搜索中引入广告 人工智能概述
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周二表示，谷歌将开始在美国测试人工智能生成答案中的搜索和购物广告，此前几天，谷歌在其年度 I/O 大会上广泛推出了人工智能概述功能。【原文：Google will start testing search and shopping ads in its AI-generated answers in the U.S., the Alphabet-owned company said on Tuesday, days after it rolled out the AI Overviews feature widely at its annual I/O conference.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Anthropic 聘请 Airbnb 资深员工 Krishna Rao 担任首任首席财务官
item.description: 据《The Information》周二援引知情人士的话报道，人工智能初创公司Anthropic已聘请Airbnb资深员工克里希纳-拉奥（Krishna Rao）担任首任财务总监。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Anthropic has hired Airbnb veteran Krishna Rao as its first finance chief, The Information reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 苹果称应驳回美国反垄断诉讼
item.description: 苹果公司周二表示，它计划要求美国法官驳回司法部和 15 个州在 3 月份提起的诉讼，该诉讼指控 iPhone 制造商垄断了智能手机市场，伤害了较小的竞争对手并抬高了价格。【原文：Apple said Tuesday it plans to ask a U.S. judge to dismiss a lawsuit filed by the Justice Department and 15 states in March that alleged the iPhone maker monopolized the smartphone market, hurt smaller rivals and drove up prices.】

item.title: 大城市购物中心是 Klepierre 与在线业务竞争的未来方向
item.description: 购物中心运营商 Klepierre 公司董事长让-马克-杰斯丁（Jean-Marc Jestin）周二告诉路透社记者，该公司正专注于欧洲最具活力和最富裕的大城市，并提供购物以外的体验，以与快速增长的在线零售商竞争。【原文：Mall operator Klepierre is focusing on Europe's most dynamic and affluent big cities and offering experiences beyond shopping to compete with fast-growing online retailers, its chairman Jean-Marc Jestin told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 微软畅谈人工智能软件制作工具
item.description: 微软周二大谈新工具，旨在鼓励程序员在Windows相关软件中构建以人工智能为重点的技术，与Alphabet、亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）和苹果公司（Apple）争夺这一新兴技术的主导权。【原文：Microsoft talked up new tools on Tuesday aimed at encouraging programmers to build the AI-focused technology into Windows-related software as it races against Alphabet , Amazon.com and Apple to dominate the emerging technology.】

item.title: 松下公司首席执行官表示，电动汽车市场增长放缓可能会推迟松下电动汽车电池的扩张步伐
item.description: 日本特斯拉供应商松下公司首席执行官表示，美国电动汽车普及速度放缓可能会促使该公司推迟投资更多工厂，以提高其在北美的汽车电池产能。【原文：A slowdown in the take-up of electric vehicles in the U.S. may prompt Tesla-supplier Panasonic to delay investing in additional plants to boost its automotive battery capacity in North America, the Japanese group's chief executive said.】

item.title: 美国将关闭东北部汽油储备，出售 100 万桶汽油
item.description: 美国能源部周二表示，拜登政府将按照法律要求出售美国东北部各州管理库存中的近 100 万桶汽油，从而有效关闭该储备。【原文：The Biden administration will sell nearly 1 million barrels of gasoline in the U.S. managed stockpile in northeastern states as required by law, the Department of Energy said on Tuesday, effectively closing the reserve.】

item.title: 通用电气航空航天公司今年招聘 900 名工程师
item.description: 通用电气航空航天公司首席执行官拉里-卡尔普（Larry Culp）周二表示，公司将在2024年招聘900名新工程师，以开发下一代技术并支持当前的发动机项目。【原文：GE Aerospace CEO Larry Culp said Tuesday the company is hiring 900 new engineers in 2024 as it develops next-generation technologies and supports current engine programs.】

item.title: 劳工部称卡特彼勒将支付 80 万美元解决种族歧视案
item.description: 美国劳工部周二表示，重型设备公司卡特彼勒已同意支付 80 万美元，以解决伊利诺伊州一家工厂在招聘时对黑人求职者的系统性歧视指控。【原文：Heavy equipment company Caterpillar has agreed to pay $800,000 to resolve allegations of systemic hiring discrimination against Black applicants at an Illinois plant, the U.S. Labor Department said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 白宫官员称，联邦存款保险公司需要 "新的开始"，新主席不属于领导层
item.description: 一位白宫官员表示，白宫认为美国联邦存款保险公司需要一个 "全新的开始"，需要一位不属于领导层的新主席。【原文：The White House believes the U.S. Federal Deposit Insurance Corp needs a "fresh start" with a new Chair that has not been part of the leadership structure, a White House official said.】

item.title: 即使增长重心转向海外，香奈儿仍将在中国开设更多门店
item.description: 香奈儿（Chanel）周二表示，尽管中国购物者在恢复旅行后转向其他市场消费，但该法国品牌仍计划在中国大陆投资开设更多门店。【原文：Chanel plans to invest in opening more stores in mainland China despite a shift in spending by Chinese shoppers to other markets as they resume travelling, the French label said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴斯夫将支付 3.16 亿美元了结 PFAS "永久化学品 "美国诉讼案
item.description: 德国化工公司巴斯夫（BASF）周二表示，该公司与美国一些公共供水系统达成了 3.165 亿美元的和解协议，这些供水系统声称该公司生产的消防泡沫中有毒的 "永久化学品 "污染了它们的供水。【原文：German chemical company BASF said on Tuesday it reached a $316.5 million settlement with some U.S. public water systems that claimed toxic “forever chemicals” in firefighting foam made by the company contaminated their water supplies.】

item.title: 解说：什么是人工智能电脑？
item.description: 个人电脑刚刚进行了人工智能改造，这让人们希望这项令人兴奋的技术将有助于重振这个在过去几年中不断下滑的行业。【原文：The PC just got an AI makeover, raising hopes that the buzzy technology would help revive an industry that has been on a steady decline over the last few years.】

item.title: 美联储报告称，美国家庭仍受通胀挤压
item.description: 美联储周二发布报告称，即使物价压力减弱，美国家庭在2023年末仍然感到通货膨胀的压力，大多数美国人表示他们的财务状况在过去一年中变化不大，而父母则表示日子变得更加艰难。【原文：U.S. households continued to feel pinched by inflation in late 2023 even as price pressures ebbed, the Federal Reserve reported on Tuesday, with most Americans saying their financial situation had changed little in the last year, while parents reported times had gotten harder.】

item.title: 康卡斯特将孔雀、Netflix、Apple TV+ 流媒体捆绑定价为每月 15 美元
item.description: 康卡斯特媒体和宽带公司周二表示，该公司新推出的流媒体捆绑服务将其 Peacock 服务与 Netflix 和 Apple TV+ 打包在一起，所有 Xfinity 互联网和电视用户的月租费为 15 美元。【原文：Comcast's new streaming bundle, packaging its Peacock service with Netflix and Apple TV+ , will cost $15 per month for all Xfinity internet and TV customers, the media and broadband company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 百事公司将电动汽车车队扩展到整个加利福尼亚州
item.description: 百事公司（PepsiCo）周二表示，将在未来几个月内引进 50 辆特斯拉 8 级半卡车和 75 辆福特 E-Transit 电动货车，从而扩大其在加利福尼亚州的电动汽车车队。【原文：PepsiCo said on Tuesday it would expand its fleet of electric-powered vehicles in California with the introduction of 50 Class 8 Tesla Semi trucks and 75 Ford E-Transit electric vans over the next several months.】
